About me

General information

Hello! My name is Nadia, I'm 26 and I'm a frontend developer from Kyiv, Ukraine. Cooperating with me you can be sure that you will receive an effective tool in the form of a website or web application that will become the hallmark of your company, distinguish it from competitors and present it to customers in a favorable light.

The purpose of my work is a properly developed website or web application that will help in the development of your business.

Web-development
Optimization according to the aspects of usability, browser compatibility, responsive web design and long-term maintainability.
Usability
Implementation of modern, interactive frontends based on current accessibility and usability standards, taking into account different browsers and devices.
Web-Application Development
Web-applications will make your business more efficient. Web-applications can act as a central database for all other company services and applications.
Final touches
I will register your domain name on the desired hosting. I will create a privacy policy. You will receive an optimized page ready for search promotion.

Skills

What do I use in work

HTML5

It creates the skeleton of your site or application, the fifth version allows me to create a more optimized structure for your product.

CSS3

This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This language allows me to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.

React

This library allows me to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product for your purposes.

Node.js

This platform allows me to create a backend for your product - "brain" that will perform actions that the user does not see.

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it into the project without the need, but I have skills to work with it.

Bootstrap

The Bootstrap library is a free set of tools that includes HTML and CSS design templates for various web interface components, including JavaScript extensions.
